column6:
"SILVER SABLE",2006,1
Spider-Man is finally brought to the head of the Roxxon conglomerate for the most bizarre confrontation of his life. Plus-what makes Ultimate Silver Sable tick? What secrets does this most colorful mercenary hold? This very special issue of Ultimate Spider-Man reveals all! Part 4 (of 5)
32 PGS./ RATED A ...$2.50
column8: | penciller (cover):Mark Bagley | writer:Brian Michael Bendis | letterer:Chris Eliopoulos | inker:Scott Hanna | colorist:J. D. Smith
